name: Isokan
description:
Bring Harmony to the 7 Realms of Chaos

FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE, ZOOM IN UNTIL GAME WINDOW FITS WELL ENOUGH ON MONITOR
-----------------

Pause - P

Move - WASD

Shoot - Left click

Harmonize - Right click and hold while standing still

Chaos Boost - Right click and hold while moving

-----------------

Rusty_TSF -> Music -> FLAMESPEAKER / LIGHTSCHOLAR

Metalogue -> Music -> Escape Velocity (end.user Remix)
